Name: Vaikesh
AboutMe: Vaikesh K P, writer, speaker, day-dreamer, is a deep lover of C#.After completing his degree from College of Applied Science - Neruvambram, he started his adventure in programming career as a software developer from Dimind Innovations. He entered the world of Xamarin through Mono, understanding the future is going to be smart with mobiles, wears, and goggles. He moved to Mazsoft Technologies as .NET/ Xamarin Developer having hands on experience in C#, ASP.Net, XAML, SQLite, MVVM, MVC and started creating cool applications to stores. His keen interest in sharing knowledge made him listed as one among the best author of C# Corner. He believes Knowledge is precious and it can be gained only by sharing, which makes him a common participator of tech forums.
